nodes.text: A human male was the husband of Pitina Mar-Mas Voor. Around 26 BBY, he served as a senator for the Galactic Republic, and married Voor on her eighteenth birthday when she was married off by her family. After the rise of the Galactic Empire, he was given an advisor's office for his loyalty. Eventually Voor spread rumors that Darth Vader suspected her husband of sedition, making sure her husband heard the rumors. The next morning, he was found hanging by his cummerbund.
